dashboard.description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/637922070 at Tue Jul 14 13:55:22 UTC 2020

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions within a minute period. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

targets.expr:
clamp_max(
  max by (type) (max_over_time(gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="waf"}[$__interval]))
  or
  sum by (type) (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{environment="$environment",monitor!~"global|",stage="$stage",type="waf"}),
  1
)

max by (type) (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="waf"} offset 1w)
or
sum by (type) (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{environment="$environment",monitor!~"global|",stage="$stage",type="waf"} offset 1w)

panels.title: Error Ratios

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{environment="$environment",stage="$stage",type="waf"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{environment="$environment",stage="$stage",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{environment="$environment",stage="$stage",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{environment="$environment",stage="$stage",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{environment="$environment",stage="$stage",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.

targets.expr:
avg by (type)
(avg_over_time(gitlab_service_ops:rate_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="waf"}[$__interval]) or avg_over_time(gitlab_service_ops:rate{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="waf"}[$__interval]))
or
sum by (type) (gitlab_service_ops:rate_5m{environment="$environment",monitor!~"global|",stage="$stage",type="waf"} or gitlab_service_ops:rate{environment="$environment",monitor!~"global|",stage="$stage",type="waf"})

avg by (type) (
  gitlab_service_ops:rate_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="waf"} offset 1w
  or
  gitlab_service_ops:rate{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="waf"} offset 1w
)
or
sum by (type) (
  gitlab_service_ops:rate_5m{environment="$environment",monitor!~"global|",stage="$stage",type="waf"} offset 1w
  or
  gitlab_service_ops:rate{environment="$environment",monitor!~"global|",stage="$stage",type="waf"} offset 1w
)

panels.title: RPS - Service Requests per Second

panels.description: Percentage time the latency SLI for this service is within SLO
panels.title: 7d Latency SLA

targets.expr:
sort(
  max(
    ALERTS{environment="$environment",stage=~"|$stage",type="waf", severity="s1", alertstate="firing"} * 4
    or
    ALERTS{environment="$environment",stage=~"|$stage",type="waf", severity="s2", alertstate="firing"} * 3
    or
    ALERTS{environment="$environment",stage=~"|$stage",type="waf", severity="s3", alertstate="firing"} * 2
    or
    ALERTS{environment="$environment",stage=~"|$stage",type="waf", alertstate="firing"}
  ) by (environment, alertname, severity)
)

panels.description: Percentage time the error ratio SLI for this service is within SLO
panels.title: 7d Error Rate SLA

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better
panels.title: gitlab_net_zone Component Error Rates

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_1h{component="gitlab_net_zone",environment="$environment",stage="$stage",type="waf"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_5m{component="gitlab_net_zone",environment="$environment",stage="$stage",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_1h{component="gitlab_net_zone",environment="$environment",stage="$stage",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_30m{component="gitlab_net_zone",environment="$environment",stage="$stage",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_6h{component="gitlab_net_zone",environment="$environment",stage="$stage",type="waf"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="waf"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for this component within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
